description: The fourth season of SHOW BY ROCK!!.
synonyms: Show by Rock!! Stars!! ภาค 4

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Werewolf
tags.description: Prominently features a character who is a werewolf.

tags.name: Rock Music
tags.description: Centers on the musical style of rock, not to be applied to anime that use rock in its soundtrack.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Cars
tags.description: Centers around the use of automotive vehicles.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

[Profile](https://www.aoni.co.jp/search/sakura-ayane.html) | [Blog (old)](http://www.joqr.co.jp/blog/sakura/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/ayane.sakura.mg/)

__Non-anime roles:__
- Nearl - Arknights (VG)
- Yae Miko - Genshin Impact (VG)
- Yae Sakura - Honkai Impact 3rd (VG)
- Julia - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Dolla - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Devonica - Ohsama Sentai King-Ohger: Adventure Heaven (Movie)
- Rio Sonogami - Date a Live: Rio Reincarnation (VG)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/uesaka_official) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/uesaka_sumire) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/uesakasumire) | [LINE Blog](https://lineblog.me/uesaka_sumire/) | [Record Label Profile](http://king-cr.jp/artist/uesakasumire/)

Sumire entered the entertainment industry at the age of 9, when she was scouted by Space Craft's junior talent division. In 2009, she landed her first regular radio gig as host of Web Raji@Dengeki Bunko, and in 2011, she transferred to animation division of Space Craft due her interest in becoming a voice actress. On March 12, 2016, Sumire received the Best Rookie Actress award in the 10th Seiyuu Awards. She has also been a member of the seiyuu unit ".lady." since 2014.

Sumire is fluent in Russian and loves the Soviet culture, which she became interested in after hearing the State Anthem of the USSR in her first year of high school. In April 2010, Sumire entered the Faculty of Foreign Studies at Sophia University, and she majored in the Russian language there.

Sumire is interested in history and war figurines, particularly Russian/Soviet history, the Showa era, and likes the book Romance of the Three Kingdoms. She also has had a strong interest in games, anime and manga ever since she was a child. Her other interests consists of photography, lolita fashion-- she works as a lolita model-- and drawing, which she is quite good at. She also loves rock and heavy metal; her favorite bands are Metallica, Judas Priest, Black Sabbath, Dragonforce, and Kinniku Shoujo Tai. Additionally, Sumire is very good friends with fellow seiyuu [Sachika Misawa](https://anilist.co/staff/102337/Sachika-Misawa), who has called Sumire "her waifu".

**Non-anime roles:**
- Rosalie - Memento Mori (VG)
- Exia - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Drake - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)

Older brother of [Tsutomu Ooshiro](https://anilist.co/staff/154775/).
Akinari Suzuki is a composer and arranger.

Funta is a duo consisting of vocalist/songwriter UCO (U子) and guitarist/keyboardist Yoshimi (吉見). The Funta "sound" can be characterized as having a strong pop rock sensibility with a tendency toward electronic elements and moe-pop vocals.
Megan Shipman is an American voice actress.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/733174574045495296)

Affiliated with [ENGI](https://anilist.co/studio/6292/).

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/1189754972) | [Bluesky](https://bsky.app/profile/bushi2424.bsky.social) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/2415493) | [Sakugabooru](https://www.sakugabooru.com/post?tags=takeshi_maenami)

He has gathered a lot of attention with his incredibly dynamic, [Kanada](https://anilist.co/staff/106398/)-inspired cuts in [Pokémon Sun & Moon](https://anilist.co/anime/97634/). His animation is characterized by erratic snappy timing, liberal and ample use of smears (often with a complete lack of outlines), and extreme perspectives. 

Graduated Yoyogi Animation School in 2009, but spent much of the following years helping out at his parents' restaurant and didn't start formally working as an animator until 2018. Currently affiliated with [WIT Studio](https://anilist.co/studio/858).
